QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_AirTerminalBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all types of air terminals.

QtoDef.Name: Perimeter
QtoDef.Definition: Perimeter of the air terminal face plate.

QtoDef.Name: TotalSurfaceArea
QtoDef.Definition: Gross area of the air terminal face plate.
